# Function to prepare plot data for a given trait
prepare_trait_data <- function(data_list, index, trait_name) {
  a_data <- prepare_plot_data(data_list[[index]]$pred_points, "a_") |> mutate(trait = trait_name)
  b_data <- prepare_plot_data(data_list[[index]]$pred_points, "b_") |> mutate(trait = trait_name)
  list(a_data, b_data)
}

# Applying the function to each segment
seg_data_list <- list(
  prepare_trait_data(pred_data_seg, 3, "wood_density"),
  prepare_trait_data(pred_data_seg, 4, "log_swc"),
  prepare_trait_data(pred_data_seg, 5, "log_dh"),
  prepare_trait_data(pred_data_seg, 6, "log_vf")
)

# Combine all segments into a single dataframe
fig_data_seg <- bind_rows(lapply(seg_data_list, unlist, recursive = FALSE)) |>
  mutate(trait = fct_relevel(trait, "wood_density", "log_swc", "log_dh", "log_vf")) |>
  mutate(val = case_when(
    trait == "wood_density" ~ log(wood_density),
    trait == "log_swc" ~ log_swc,
    trait == "log_dh" ~ log_dh,
    trait == "log_vf" ~ log_vf
  ))

  source("R/traits.R")
